overview: Cannabis farmers from outer space awaken Wolpodzilla, a giant Wolpertinger, to destroy Munich's Oktoberfest 'cause the Theresienwiese is their preferred location for a new plantation. When Wolpodzilla gets high and goes on a rampage Wolpertinger hunter Toni and Godzilla expert Mariko come to the rescue.
title: Wolpodzilla - Der Schrecken vom Tegernsee
